Name: Arithal
About the game: Arithal: Chapter Ildsted is a short experience taking the player on a classic adventure game combined with turn-based battle mechanics, set in a dark-but-lighthearted world wreathed in snow and beset by monsters from the depths of the ocean. Features Deadly turn based battles. Adventure game style exploration, item gathering and puzzle solving. Discoverable skills and equipment. Cast of unique characters. Secrets to uncover.
